title: Calories in Chicken Burrito Chipotle
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken burrito chipotle, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Chipotle-style: flour tortilla, grilled chicken, white rice, black beans, mild salsa, cheese, sour cream, lettuce; ~500g total weight.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact ingredients, portion sizes, and preparation at Chipotle or similar; check app or labels for custom builds.

quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle chicken burrito contains about 870 kcal and 45 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chipotle chicken burrito?
faqs.a: Approximately 870 kcal for a standard build with rice, beans, cheese, and salsa.

faqs.q: What's the protein in chicken burrito chipotle?
faqs.a: About 45 g protein from the grilled chicken and beans.

faqs.q: Are Chipotle burritos high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 2100 mg sodium due to seasonings, beans, and salsa.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in chicken burrito chipotle?
faqs.a: Skip cheese, sour cream, and rice; opt for a bowl instead of tortilla to save ~200-300 kcal.

faqs.q: Carbs in a chicken burrito from Chipotle?
faqs.a: Roughly 100 g carbs, mostly from the tortilla and rice, with 10 g fiber.
